**Proactive Monitoring**

We understand that in order to run a successful website or business your VPS must have superior uptime. In addition to proactively monitoring our nodes, we have also decided to offer **free** proactive monitoring to our VPS customers.  

We use a third party company to ping your VPS IP address in 5 minute intervals. If the ping fails the following happens: 1) An SMS message is sent to the technician who's on duty 2) An automatic ticket is opened at our help desk. We will then investigate what caused the ping test to fail and communicate with you via the ticket that was automated opened.

**Free VPS Migration**

Want to switch from another host to DaringHost? No worries! We offer free VPS transfers with every plan. We will move and restore your VPS on our servers at no extra cost. Just open a support ticket after you place an order.

**Datacenter + Network**

Our VPS nodes are located in Steadfast's 725 S Wells Facility (Chicago, Illinois)

Our VPS nodes are connected to a rock solid fully redundant BGP4 network (AS32748 - Steadfast Networks) consisting of multiple Tier 1 bandwidth providers.
